ResearchProjectDef.label: togas
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft togas, everyday wear of the citizens of the republic.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->reclaimed the elegance and simplicity of the toga, the symbol of citizenship and refined taste
subject_gerund->draping the republic in the dignity and grace of its ancestors

ResearchProjectDef.label: temperature control
ResearchProjectDef.description: Make large passive coolers, a way to cool indoor spaces below freezing point without needing electricity, or hot stones, a primitive heater.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->harnessed natural methods to defy the whims of weather, creating spaces of comfort through passive coolers and hot stones
subject_gerund->cultivating havens of warmth and coolness, in defiance of the external world

ResearchProjectDef.label: meat drying
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct meat drying racks, allowing you to preserve meat and create a roman delicacy.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->revived the ancient art of meat drying, securing sustenance and delighting palates with flavors honed by time
subject_gerund->extending the bounty of the hunt through the wisdom of the ancients

ResearchProjectDef.label: mosaics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build excellent stone mosaics, utilising different colours and shapes to express beauty. Slow to construct.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->crafted stone mosaics that capture the essence of beauty and narrative through color and form
subject_gerund->embedding the story of a people in the very stones that pave their path

ResearchProjectDef.label: drama and comedy
ResearchProjectDef.description: Perform various plays on the theatre stage as a recreational activity.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->revived the timeless arts of drama and comedy, enriching the soul of the republic through performance and play
subject_gerund->mirroring the human condition, from tragedy to farce, on the communal stage
